name: Poly (itch)
description:
Hey there! :)

 I'm working on this game,  which is my first game project, and the idea was to create a simple and minimalistic game, with nice music and some vFx.

 The initial idea was do it only for Android, IOS and Web, but, i noticed the whole graphics details wouldnt appreciate in these resolutions, so it's for that i will export it in PC aswell, so you can see it for complete :)

  I will be making new updates, because i want to add more stuff, it's not 100% complete for me, but at least i have the main concept.
